javadoc.text: * Extension of {@link MultivariateFunction} representing a * multivariate differentiable real function.
* Compute the value for the function at the given point.
javadoc.param: point Point at which the function must be evaluated.
javadoc.return: the function value for the given point.
javadoc.exception: MathIllegalArgumentException if {@code point} does not * satisfy the function's constraints (wrong dimension, argument out of bound, * or unsupported derivative order for example)
